activity: Guided Bicycle Tour of Münster's Parks
description: Join a guided bicycle tour through Münster's lush parks and green spaces, exploring hidden corners and scenic routes with your group.

locationInfo.description: A guided bicycle tour through Münster's picturesque parks, including Schlosspark and Stadtpark, offering scenic views and a relaxed atmosphere.
safetyTips: Ensure your bike is properly tuned and safe to ride.
Wear a helmet and comfortable clothing.
Stay hydrated and take breaks if needed.

activity: Münster Cathedral and Historical Sites Tour
description: Explore Münster's most famous historical landmarks, including the stunning St. Paulus Cathedral, with a knowledgeable guide.

locationInfo.description: A tour through Münster's historic center, featuring the magnificent St. Paulus Cathedral and other key historical sites.
safetyTips: Stay with the group to ensure everyone gets the full experience.
Be mindful of your surroundings in busy tourist areas.

activity: Nature Walk and Bird Watching at Stadtwald Münster
description: Take a guided nature walk through the Stadtwald Münster and enjoy bird watching with your group in the beautiful forest setting.

locationInfo.description: A peaceful walk through Stadtwald Münster, offering plenty of opportunities for bird watching and enjoying the natural surroundings.
safetyTips: Carry binoculars for the best bird-watching experience.
Bring a light jacket in case the weather gets chilly.

description: Enjoy a paddleboarding adventure on Aasee with your group, perfect for getting some light exercise while taking in the beautiful surroundings.

locationInfo.description: A relaxing paddleboarding session on Aasee lake, offering a chance to enjoy the peaceful waters and scenic views of Münster's parks.
safetyTips: Wear a life vest for safety.
Check the paddleboard equipment before starting.
Be aware of your surroundings and other water users.

activity: Group Photography Walk at Münster's Old Town
description: Capture the charm of Münster’s Old Town with your group during a guided photography walk, perfect for photographers of all skill levels.

locationInfo.description: Explore Münster’s picturesque Old Town, known for its cobbled streets and historic buildings, while improving your photography skills.
safetyTips: Bring a camera or smartphone with enough battery.
Wear comfortable walking shoes for exploring.
Stay together as a group to make sure no one gets lost.
